snippet.title: Update #9 - The Nature's Giant  (2D Sandbox game)
snippet.description:
We added a new mob, character creation system, agriculture system, new equipment and weather effects.
----------------------------
Rise of Ages is a 2D sandbox game that have RPG elements, like quests, attributes and dungeons to explore. The game is characterized mainly by the possibily of advance historical ages by technology evolution. The main feature is the evolution through historical ages. The player will begin in the stone age and will advance according with the technologies achieved.
----------------------------
Download:
http://gamejolt.com/games/rise-of-ages/189969
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/riseofages
indiedb: 
http://www.indiedb.com/games/rise-of-ages
